trans.ptxt: NOTE: After turning the vehicle to the OFF (LOCK) mode, do not disconnect and isolate the negative cable connected to the volt battery at least minute.

s1.ptxt: Make sure the vehicle is in the OFF (LOCK) mode.
Disconnect and isolate the negative cable (A) with the volt battery sensor (B) from the volt battery.

item.ptxt: Always disconnect the negative side first.
To protect the connector (C) from damage, do not hold it when removing the negative terminal.
Do not disconnect the volt battery sensor from the negative terminal.

s1.ptxt: Disconnect the positive cable and the volt battery terminal (E) from the volt battery.

trans.ptxt: NOTE: If the volt battery performs abnormally, test the volt battery; refer to the appropriate Fit/Jazz Shop Manual.

s1.ptxt: Connect the positive cable and the volt battery terminal (A) to the volt battery.
NOTE: Always connect the positive side first.
Connect the negative cable and the volt battery sensor (C) to the volt battery.
NOTE: To protect the connector (D) from damage, do not hold it when installing the negative terminal.
Apply multipurpose grease to the terminals to prevent corrosion.
